name: Gravy for Turkey
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon flour for every 2 cups drippings

recipeInstructions.text: Pour off fat from pan drippings. Strain drippings; measure them, to know how much flour to use. Pour drippings into a saucepan and heat over high heat.
Combine a little of the drippings with the flour to make a paste. Whisk paste into drippings with lemon juice.
Cook over medium heat until gravy thickens, and beat well. Serve with turkey.
